message: "Through investigation, officers determined that human trafficking was involved and contacted the San Bernardino County Human Trafficking Task Force to assume the investigation. Investigators were able to locate evidence allegedly implicating the suspect, Alan Rhodes."

data.description: A 35-year-old Pasadena man was arrested in Ontario on charges of robbery, pimping, pandering and human trafficking of an adult, according to the San Bernardino County Sheriff's Department.
data.title: Man is arrested in Ontario on human trafficking charges
